title: Kate McKinnon Tries to Top Kristen Stewart in SNL Promo Battle
text:
Kristen Stewart has a very unique superpower, and that’s the ability to say “fuck” during an episode of Saturday Night Live and not only not get blacklisted by the show, but be invited back to host for a second time. It’s happening this weekend, when she returns to host alongside musical guest Coldplay, and she’s come prepared to not only be funny but to take over the whole damn show. Kate McKinnon, however, is not going to go down without a fight: “I think we all know who the king of the castle is around here, right?” No disrespect for McKinnon, but we’d advise not upsetting Stewart. Like she says in the promo, “This week, the show’s all mine.” Just accept it.

Related
description: NBC’s ‘Saturday Night Live’ released the first promo for returning host Kristen Stewart’s episode this weekend, in which she faces off in the ultimate battle against Kate McKinnon.
